translations: n.催化作用；触媒作用（catalysis 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Glutamine synthetase (GS) catalyses the conversion of ammonium to glutamine.
sentences.translation: 谷氨酰胺合酶(GS)催化氨向谷氨酰胺的转化。

sentences.sentence: It is an integral part of the electron transport chain that catalyses primary charge separation.
sentences.translation: 这是一对电子传递链的电荷分离催化的主要组成部分。

sentences.sentence: The plant hydrolyzed-enzyme catalyses naphthyl acetate hydrolyzed reaction, which produces acetic acid.
sentences.translation: 该方法基本原理是：植物水解酶促进乙酸萘酯分解生成乙酸。
